title: Twin upstairs house
details:
A twin up-stair house (semi detached) each unit has 2 big double bed rooms, hall, dining room and kitchen, up stairs a big toilet with shower and down stairs just toilet and one servants toilet with shower. the house stands on approximately 9.75 perches and is 100m from the Colombo-Negombo main road, in a highly residential area in Kandana.It has pipe borne water from overhead tank (hot water for toilet and kitchen), 3-phase power supply, communal front yard space for 2 cars, enclosed by chain-link fence and gate in front and wall to the back.

90/10D & 90/10E Negombo Road, Kandana.

We are selling as we have moved to UK

Our asking price for the whole property is
Rs. 18 million.

Our details are;
